title: Foundation season 2 is coming this year, and Apple TV+ just revealed a first look
content:
One of the most anticipated Apple Originals, Foundation, is set for a comeback soon – Apple shared its new cast and first look at this spatial saga based on Isaac Asimov’s books.

more…

The post Foundation season 2 is coming this year, and Apple TV+ just revealed a first look appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Foundation is set for a comeback soon, as Apple shared its new cast and first look at this spatial saga based on Isaac Asimov's books.
